txt.en: 'Acquainting yourself with the different clans is the first step in blooding yourself on the battlefield. To further your preparations return to the front gate and speak with Cinaid. He will further instruct and prepare you for the battle ahead.\n\n'Again, sister, welcome to the fight. Let the true children show these lesser creatures how wars should be fought.'

'I am pleased to see you still here, mistress of darkness. The lessons I have to teach are manifold and important. They will aid you greatly in this foetid land.'

He pauses a moment.

'I think it is time to properly prepare you.'

<rgb=#00FF00> After completing this quest, you will have your first corruption. To equip traits and Corruptions speak again with the Corruptor. Select the available traits and Corruptions from the list and drag them into the empty trait slots. When you are finished, confirm your selections.</rgb>
Malavin, the emissary of Angmar, directed you to return to where you began your journey in the Ettenmoors to speak with the corruptor there.
Malavin directed you to return to Cinaid near the front gate of Gramsfoot. He will aid you further in preparing to battle throughout the Ettenmoors.
